attributes.action: Close all boarding schools due to increase of covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Also because people were getting some nasty illnesses and we are all together in one building and you have to be aware that there are alot kids who are very vulnerable. Who are future for this country.
attributes.background:
So when I went to boarding school for the past 6 weeks in the first week it was alright
However drastically people were getting really ill and we all sleep next to eachother 
I don't think it's a good idea to open boarding schools for a couple months

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

All nurseries and places of education to stay closed after Xmas to 15 January
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561988

Close schools with confirmed COVID cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551681
